verses.1: Numei pilte in inn sung nuntakna khangsak a, numei haite in inn sung susia hi.
verses.2: Thumanin a gamta mite in Topa zahtak uh a, a sia-in a gamta mite in Topa simmawh uh hi.
verses.3: Mihaite a pau ciangin siatna thuak lawh uh a, mipilteʼ pauna in siat nading pan pengsak hi.
verses.4: Bawngtal om kei leh lo panin an tawm bek kila a, bawngtal tha tawh an a kihau ahi hi.
verses.5: A citak teci in thuman bekbek gen tawntung a, a gina lo teci in zuau bekbek gen tawntung hi.
verses.6: Mi a simmawh theite in pilna a zon uh hangin ngah zo lo uh a, thungaihsun theite in olno takin ngah thei uh hi.
verses.7: Mihaite tawh kikhawl kei in; amauʼ kiang pan pilna na ngah kei ding hi.
verses.8: Thungaihsun theite a pilna in lampi man musak a, mihaite a haina in lam khialsak hi.
verses.9: Mihaite in a khialh hangun phamawh sa lo uh a, mipilte a khialh ciangun mawhmaisak ding deih uh hi.
verses.10: Lungdamna le lungkhamna eimah bek in i theih hi a, midang kuamah in hong phawkpih kha lo hi.
verses.11: Migiloteʼ inn kisusia dinga, thuman miteʼ inn kipin gina semsem ding hi.
verses.12: Mihingte in thuman lampi hi, ci-in a ngaihsutte pen sihna lampi hi kha thei hi.
verses.13: Nuihna pen cihmawh seelna zong hi thei a, kigualnop sakna a ven ciangin dahna hong kilangkik hi.
verses.14: Misia in siatna thaman ngah a, mipha in phatna thaman ngah hi.
verses.15: Mihaite in a thu zak peuh um pahpah a, mipilte in a gamtat nading ngaihsun cian hi.
verses.16: Mipilte kidawmin siatna panin kihem a, mihaite in thu ngaihsun masa loin gamta pahpah hi.
verses.17: A lung tom mite hai gamtat a, mipilte lungduai hi.
verses.18: Mihaite in haina bek mah ngah a, mipilte in pilna mah ngah thuah hi.
verses.19: Migilote in mihoihte mai-et uh a, maipha a piak ding uh a thum uh hi.
verses.20: Kuamah in mizawngte ngai lo a, mihaute in lawm tampi nei hi.
verses.21: Mizawngte a simmawhte a khial hi a, mizawngte tungah a cinghte a lungdam hi.
verses.22: Na a hoih a semte mite in muangin zahtak a, a sia gamtatna pen khialhna lianpi ahi hi.
verses.23: Gimpi a nasepna pen hauhna hi a, kam bek pau-in tut mawkna pen zawnna ahi hi.
verses.24: Pilna pen mipilteʼ minthanna lukhu hi a, haina pen mihaiteʼ kizepna bulpi ahi hi.
verses.25: Thutak a gen teci in nuntakna hu zo a, zuau thu a gen teci in mi lehhek hi.
verses.26: Topa a zahtak mi in lungmuanna nei a, a tateʼ belh theih ding mi kician ahi hi.
verses.27: Topa zahtakna pen nuntakna tuinak tawh kibang a, sihna thang tawh hong kipelhsak hi.
verses.28: Mi tampi a uk kumpipa minthang a, a uk ding mi om kei leh a mawkna ahi hi.
verses.29: A lungduaite mipil hi a, lungtomna pen haina kilatna ahi hi.
verses.30: Lungnopna in pumpi cidamsak a, hazatna pen guh a muatsak natna ahi hi.
verses.31: Mizawngte bawlsiatna pen a piangsak Pasian simmawhna hi a, mizawngte tungah citna pen Pasian zahtakna ahi hi.
verses.32: Migilo pa ama tatsiatna in puksak a, mihoih pa ama hoih tatna in hu hi.
verses.33: Thungaihsun theiteʼ sungah pilna teeng a, mihaite in pilna thei kha lo uh hi.
verses.34: Thumanna in minam min thangsak a, mawhna in minam mindaisak hi.
verses.35: A hoihin a gamta a mite tungah kumpipa lungdam a, a gina-in a gamta lote gim a pia hi.
